languages.text: "Я меняюсь, чтобы лучше служить Лексу, разве это не часть долга?" {n}Проктор переводит взгляд с вас на Глейто.{/n} "Не ожидал от вас подобных слов, учитывая... Нет, не важно. Вы сказали, что считали нужным".

"I change in order to better serve the Lex — is that not part of my duty?" {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."
languages.original_text: "Я меняюсь, чтобы лучше служить Лексу, разве это не часть долга?" {n}Проктор переводит взгляд с вас на Глейто.{/n} "Не ожидал от вас подобных слов, учитывая... Нет, не важно. Вы сказали, что считали нужным".

traits.locale_text: "I change in order to better serve the Lex — is that not part of my duty?" {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."

"I change in order to better serve the Lex — is that not part of my duty?" {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."

"I change in order to better serve the Lex — is that not part of my duty?" {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."

"On the planet of the blind, the sighted man is an abomination." {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."

"I change in order to better serve the Lex — is that not part of my duty?" {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."

"I change in order to better serve the Lex — is that not part of my duty?" {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."

"I change in order to better serve the Lex — is that not part of my duty?" {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."

languages.text: 「レクスのために変わるのは義務ではないでしょうか」{n}代理人はあなたからグライトへと視線を移した。{/n}「あなたの口からそんな言葉を聞くとは思いませんでした。考えてみれば…いえ、まあいいでしょう。あなたは、自分が言うべきだと思ったことを言ったのですから」
languages.original_text: "I change in order to better serve the Lex — is that not part of my duty?" {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."

traits.locale_text: 「盲人の国では、見える者は忌むべき存在とされます」{n}代理人はあなたからグライトへと視線を移した。{/n}「あなたの口からそんな言葉を聞くとは思いませんでした。考えてみれば…いえ、まあいいでしょう。あなたは、自分が言うべきだと思ったことを言ったのですから」

languages.text: "Ich verändere mich, um dem Lex besser zu dienen – ist das nicht Teil meiner Pflicht?" {n}Der Proktor wendet den Blick von dir ab und sieht Glaito an.{/n} "Solche Worte hatte ich von Euch nicht erwartet, zumal ... Nun, es spielt keine Rolle. Ihr habt gesagt, was zu sagen Ihr für erforderlich hieltet."
languages.original_text: "I change in order to better serve the Lex — is that not part of my duty?" {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verändere mich, um dem Lex besser zu dienen – ist das nicht Teil meiner Pflicht?" {n}Der Proktor wendet den Blick von dir ab und sieht Glaito an.{/n} "Solche Worte hatte ich von Euch nicht erwartet, zumal ... Nun, es spielt keine Rolle. Ihr habt gesagt, was zu sagen Ihr für erforderlich hieltet."

languages.text: « Je fais le nécessaire pour servir la Lex au mieux... N'est-ce pas là mon devoir ? » {n}déclare le Proctor en détournant son regard de vous pour le poser sur Glaito.{/n} Je ne m'attendais pas à de telles paroles de votre part, vu que... Enfin, peu importe. Vous avez dit ce que vous vouliez me dire. »
languages.original_text: "I change in order to better serve the Lex — is that not part of my duty?" {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."

traits.locale_text: « Je fais le nécessaire pour servir la Lex au mieux... N'est-ce pas là mon devoir ? » {n}déclare le Proctor en détournant son regard de vous pour le poser sur Glaito.{/n} Je ne m'attendais pas à de telles paroles de votre part, vu que... Enfin, peu importe. Vous avez dit ce que vous vouliez me dire. »

languages.text: «Cambio para servir mejor a la Lex. ¿Acaso no forma parte de mis deberes el hacerlo?». {n}El Procurador desvía la mirada de ti a Glaito.{/n} «No esperaba oírle decir esas palabras, teniendo en cuenta... Bueno, tanto da. Ha dicho lo que creía conveniente decir».
languages.original_text: "I change in order to better serve the Lex — is that not part of my duty?" {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."

traits.locale_text: «Cambio para servir mejor a la Lex. ¿Acaso no forma parte de mis deberes el hacerlo?». {n}El Procurador desvía la mirada de ti a Glaito.{/n} «No esperaba oírle decir esas palabras, teniendo en cuenta... Bueno, tanto da. Ha dicho lo que creía conveniente decir».

languages.text: “我之所以会改变，正是为了更好地侍奉帝国律法。这是我的职责所在，是吧？”{n}索罗蒙看着你，目光随后移到了格雷托身上。{/n}“我没想到你会说出这样的话，毕竟……不过，没关系，你只是说出了你认为该说的话。”
languages.original_text: "I change in order to better serve the Lex — is that not part of my duty?" {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."

traits.locale_text: “我之所以会改变，正是为了更好地侍奉帝国律法。这是我的职责所在，是吧？”{n}索罗蒙看着你，目光随后移到了格雷托身上。{/n}“我没想到你会说出这样的话，毕竟……不过，没关系，你只是说出了你认为该说的话。”

languages.text: "Lex'e daha iyi hizmet etmek için değişiyorum. Bu da vazifem değil mi?" {n}Üsteğmen, bakışlarını Glaito'ya çeviriyor.{/n} "Biraz düşününce sizden bu sözleri işitmeyi beklemezdim. Neyse, önemli değil. Söylemeye gerek gördünüz ve söylediniz."
languages.original_text: "I change in order to better serve the Lex — is that not part of my duty?" {n}The Proctor shifts his gaze from you to Glaito.{/n} "I did not expect to hear such words from you, considering... Well, it doesn't matter. You said what you thought you needed to say."
